sections.paragraph: உம், ஏ, ஆமாம், ஆகையால், எத்தனை, அல்லாமல், எம்மாத்திரம், இருந்தாலும், மேலும் - எச்சம்
also, yea, though, so much the more, furthermore, indeed

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive particle; meaning accession (used as an adverb or conjugation); also or yea; adversatively though: - also, + although, and (furthermore, yet), but, even, + how much less (more, rather than), moreover, with, yea.
